amendatorysection.catchline: Violence Prevention Cash Fund; created; administration; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Violence Prevention Cash Fund is created. The fund shall be administered by the Nebraska Commission on Law Enforcement and Criminal Justice. The State Treasurer shall credit to the fund such money as is transferred to the fund by the Legislature, donated as gifts, bequests, or other contributions to such fund from public or private entities, and made available by any department or agency of the United States if so directed by such department or agency. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
